allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD='qGXA1CR3FVnsq4fp78Z6h31ROzzU2DJsSF0lX1Aq7Uk=' psql -h localhost -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE beautycita_test OWNER beautycita_app;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD='qGXA1CR3FVnsq4fp78Z6h31ROzzU2DJsSF0lX1Aq7Uk=' psql -h localhost -U beautycita_app -d beautycita -c "SELECT pg_size_pretty(pg_database_size(''beautycita'')) as db_size;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='qGXA1CR3FVnsq4fp78Z6h31ROzzU2DJsSF0lX1Aq7Uk=' psql -h localhost -U beautycita_app -d beautycita -c "SELECT id, email, phone, role, phone_verified FROM users WHERE phone IN (''+523221215551'', ''+527206777070'');")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='qGXA1CR3FVnsq4fp78Z6h31ROzzU2DJsSF0lX1Aq7Uk=' psql -h localhost -U beautycita_app -d beautycita -c "SELECT id, email, phone, role, phone_verified, is_active FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;")
